title: Is attendance mandatory for CS 577?
body: I assume it's mandatory for the discussion section. Could anybody share more information about the lecture by Marc Renault? If he uses Tophat, does the correctness matter?
comments: Only sometimes but like everyone who skips lectures in Algorithm's just fails it anyway.
Spring last year there was a lecture attendance grade that came from tophat
In Spring 2023 it was extra credit (up to 5%) and as long as you participated you got the credit for the question. But definitely something subject to change semester to semester.
